name: Maze of the Soul (eng)
description:
Description: Maka was struck by lightning and fell into a deep endless sleep, from which he was forced to look for a way out. Only you can help him!
Gameplay: Adventure in the labyrinth - You play as the soul of Mac and help her find a way out of sleep in time. When the time runs out, the sleep repeats.
Controls: WASD or arrows

Ludum Dare 47
